about_the_game:
Welcome to Maceno Island, a man made paradise home to high rise sea fronts, massive jungles, precarious mountain thrills and an AGL newcomer with a rich history in sea bed mineral mining and designer sandals.

Maceno Island introduces 6 new tracks, all playable in forward and reverse, a new campaign and a new set of colorful liveries.

Tracks

  • Maceno Bay: The tropical season starts here with Maceno's introduction track, snaking through the islands biggest tourist destination and dropping pilots into the seabed below.
  • Therma Fumos: Dive deep into Therma Fumos, Maceno's white smoker mineral mining operation. This season's second course lays on a familiar bed to those acquainted with previous AGL events.
  • Maceno Interchange: Catch some rays on the streets of Maceno's sun-drenched business sector, purple lit tracks carving through the spiral towers of tommorow.
  • Freyr Falls: Race through the jungle of Maceno and glide off the islands largest waterfall with this white knuckle circuit.
  • Alto Overseer: Dark thrills await you in the mountain. Fly through the caverns of Maceno Island's dormant volcano and peek a look at the islands vast jungle landscape.
  • Maceno Peak: Precariously seated at the peak of Maceno Islands mountain, Maceno Peak offers tight corners and plenty of verticality for veteran pilots.

Notes

  • The tracks added in this DLC are not part of the base game. If you want to play the new tracks online you will need to own and have Maceno Island installed. The liveries are however part of the base game and will be visible by all players in online play.
  • BallisticNG DLC is DRM free. Once the files are downloaded you don't need Steam running to play the content.
detailed_description:
Welcome to Maceno Island, a man made paradise home to high rise sea fronts, massive jungles, precarious mountain thrills and an AGL newcomer with a rich history in sea bed mineral mining and designer sandals.

Maceno Island introduces 6 new tracks, all playable in forward and reverse, a new campaign and a new set of colorful liveries.

Tracks

  • Maceno Bay: The tropical season starts here with Maceno's introduction track, snaking through the islands biggest tourist destination and dropping pilots into the seabed below.
  • Therma Fumos: Dive deep into Therma Fumos, Maceno's white smoker mineral mining operation. This season's second course lays on a familiar bed to those acquainted with previous AGL events.
  • Maceno Interchange: Catch some rays on the streets of Maceno's sun-drenched business sector, purple lit tracks carving through the spiral towers of tommorow.
  • Freyr Falls: Race through the jungle of Maceno and glide off the islands largest waterfall with this white knuckle circuit.
  • Alto Overseer: Dark thrills await you in the mountain. Fly through the caverns of Maceno Island's dormant volcano and peek a look at the islands vast jungle landscape.
  • Maceno Peak: Precariously seated at the peak of Maceno Islands mountain, Maceno Peak offers tight corners and plenty of verticality for veteran pilots.

Notes

  • The tracks added in this DLC are not part of the base game. If you want to play the new tracks online you will need to own and have Maceno Island installed. The liveries are however part of the base game and will be visible by all players in online play.
  • BallisticNG DLC is DRM free. Once the files are downloaded you don't need Steam running to play the content.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit distro
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 130 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires OpenGL 3.2+.

  • OS: 64-bit distro
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 130 MB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later (64-bit only)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 130 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: OpenGL 3.2+ GPUs also supported.

  • OS *: Windows 7 or later (64-bit only)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 130 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: OpenGL 3.2+ GPUs also supported.
